acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle basic inheritance scenarios
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleBasicInheritance

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalChildPojo

Then the Object AbstractOneDimensionalPojo ( parentIntField = 3 parentCalendarField = Sun May 31 21:30:03 BST 2015 ) OneDimensionalChildPojo ( intField = 1454481394 strField = gGFqURjjxG ) should not be null
Then the int value 3 should be less or equal to 10
Then the calendar value should be valid
Then the int field should not be zero
Then the String field gGFqURjjxG cannot be null or empty
